languages.text: "Спасение от смерти, чье имя еще неведомо, но чью поступь чуют многие. Скоро она приберет всех живущих в Просторе Коронус. Думаешь, когда катаклизмы сотрясут наши дома, а на планетах воцарится геноцид, кто-то придет на помощь нам? Император или железный идол {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссия{/g}? Нет, мы будем умирать одни, брошенные. Лишь одно божество обещает спасение, и это — Предел рассвета. Всякий, кто уверует в него и очистит душу в лучах Последнего восхода, будет помилован и спасен".

traits.locale_text: "Спасение от смерти, чье имя еще неведомо, но чью поступь чуют многие. Скоро она приберет всех живущих в Просторе Коронус. Думаешь, когда катаклизмы сотрясут наши дома, а на планетах воцарится геноцид, кто-то придет на помощь нам? Император или железный идол {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссия{/g}? Нет, мы будем умирать одни, брошенные. Лишь одно божество обещает спасение, и это — Предел рассвета. Всякий, кто уверует в него и очистит душу в лучах Последнего восхода, будет помилован и спасен".

languages.text: "Salvation from a death whose name is yet unknown, but whose approach is sensed by many. Soon it will claim every inhabitant of the Koronus Expanse. Do you think anyone will come to our aid when cataclysms shake our homes and planet-wide genocides are unleashed? Will the Emperor help? Or the idol of iron they call the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}? No. We will die alone and abandoned. Only one deity is promising salvation: the Edge of Daybreak. Mercy and salvation will come to all who believe in him and purify their souls in the light of the Final Dawn."
languages.original_text: "Спасение от смерти, чье имя еще неведомо, но чью поступь чуют многие. Скоро она приберет всех живущих в Просторе Коронус. languages.text: "Die Erlösung von einem Tod, dessen Name bisher unbekannt ist, doch dessen Kommen viele spüren. Bald wird er die Leben sämtlicher Bewohner der Koronus-Ausdehnung fordern. Glaubt Ihr, irgendjemand wird uns zur Hilfe kommen, wenn Katastrophen unsere Häuser erzittern lassen und planetenweite Genozide beginnen? Wird der Imperator uns helfen? Oder der eiserne Götze, den sie den {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} nennen? Nein. Wir werden allein und verlassen sterben. Nur eine Gottheit verspricht Erlösung: der Rand des Tagesanbruchs. Gnade und Erlösung werden all jenen zuteil werden, die an ihn glauben und ihre Seelen im Licht der Letzten Dämmerung läutern."
languages.original_text: "Salvation from a death whose name is yet unknown, but whose approach is sensed by many. Soon it will claim every inhabitant of the Koronus Expanse. Do you think anyone will come to our aid when cataclysms shake our homes and planet-wide genocides are unleashed? Will the Emperor help? Or the idol of iron they call the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}? No. We will die alone and abandoned. Only one deity is promising salvation: the Edge of Daybreak. Mercy and salvation will come to all who believe in him and purify their souls in the light of the Final Dawn."

Glaubt Ihr, irgendjemand wird uns zur Hilfe kommen, wenn Katastrophen unsere Häuser erzittern lassen und planetenweite Genozide beginnen? Wird der Imperator uns helfen? Gnade und Erlösung werden all jenen zuteil werden, die an ihn glauben und ihre Seelen im Licht der Letzten Dämmerung läutern."

languages.text: « Le salut face à une mort dont on ne sait encore rien, mais dont beaucoup ressentent l'approche. Bientôt, elle prendra tous les peuples des Étendues de Koronus... Qui, à votre avis, viendra à notre aide, lorsque des catastrophes ébranleront nos foyers et éradiqueront les populations de planètes entières ? L'empereur ? L'idole de fer qu'ils appellent l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} ? Non. Nous mourrons seuls et abandonnés... Une seule divinité nous promet de nous sauver, et c'est la Lame de l'Aube ! La miséricorde et le salut seront accordés à celles et ceux qui croient en Lui et qui se purifient l'âme à la lumière de l'Aube finale. »
languages.original_text: "Salvation from a death whose name is yet unknown, but whose approach is sensed by many. Soon it will claim every inhabitant of the Koronus Expanse. Do you think anyone will come to our aid when cataclysms shake our homes and planet-wide genocides are unleashed? Will the Emperor help? Or the idol of iron they call the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}? No. We will die alone and abandoned. Only one deity is promising salvation: the Edge of Daybreak. Mercy and salvation will come to all who believe in him and purify their souls in the light of the Final Dawn."

traits.locale_text: « Le salut face à une mort dont on ne sait encore rien, mais dont beaucoup ressentent l'approche. Bientôt, elle prendra tous les peuples des Étendues de Koronus... L'idole de fer qu'ils appellent l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} ? Non. Nous mourrons seuls et abandonnés... Une seule divinité nous promet de nous sauver, et c'est la Lame de l'Aube ! La miséricorde et le salut seront accordés à celles et ceux qui croient en Lui et qui se purifient l'âme à la lumière de l'Aube finale. »

languages.text: “终末黎明是救赎，它会将我们从未知的灾难中拯救出来。目前还没人知道这究竟是什么灾难，但已经有许多人察觉到了它的迫近。用不了多久，它就会杀死科罗努斯扩区的所有居民。当灾难撕裂我们的家园，整个行星面临灭绝之时，你认为谁会帮助我们？帝皇会伸出援手吗？还是说，他们称之为{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的铁神像会出手相助？不，我们只会被遗弃，孤苦伶仃地丧命。只有一位神明能给我们带来救赎，那就是破晓锋刃。怜悯与救赎会降临在所有信仰他的人身上。在终末黎明的光辉中，他们的灵魂将得到净化。”
languages.original_text: "Salvation from a death whose name is yet unknown, but whose approach is sensed by many. Soon it will claim every inhabitant of the Koronus Expanse. Do you think anyone will come to our aid when cataclysms shake our homes and planet-wide genocides are unleashed? Will the Emperor help? Or the idol of iron they call the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}? No. We will die alone and abandoned. Only one deity is promising salvation: the Edge of Daybreak. Mercy and salvation will come to all who believe in him and purify their souls in the light of the Final Dawn."

traits.locale_text: “终末黎明是救赎，它会将我们从未知的灾难中拯救出来。目前还没人知道这究竟是什么灾难，但已经有许多人察觉到了它的迫近。用不了多久，它就会杀死科罗努斯扩区的所有居民。当灾难撕裂我们的家园，整个行星面临灭绝之时，你认为谁会帮助我们？帝皇会伸出援手吗？还是说，他们称之为{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的铁神像会出手相助？不，我们只会被遗弃，孤苦伶仃地丧命。只有一位神明能给我们带来救赎，那就是破晓锋刃。怜悯与救赎会降临在所有信仰他的人身上。在终末黎明的光辉中，他们的灵魂将得到净化。”

languages.text: 「名前すら知らぬ死からの救い…それが近づいていることに多くの者が感じている。そのうち、コロヌス・エクスパンスで生きる者達を襲うだろう。大災害が故郷を揺るがし、地球規模の虐殺が起こったとき、誰かが助けに来てくれると思うか？皇帝は助けてくれるのか? それとも{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}と呼ばれる鉄の偶像が助けてくれるか？それはない。我々は孤独に死んで見捨てられるのだ。救いを約束してくれる神はただひとり。暁の刃だ。慈悲と救いはあの方を信じる者全てに訪れて、最後の夜明けの光の中で魂を浄化するのだ」
languages.original_text: "Salvation from a death whose name is yet unknown, but whose approach is sensed by many. Soon it will claim every inhabitant of the Koronus Expanse. Do you think anyone will come to our aid when cataclysms shake our homes and planet-wide genocides are unleashed? Will the Emperor help? Or the idol of iron they call the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}? No. We will die alone and abandoned. Only one deity is promising salvation: the Edge of Daybreak. Mercy and salvation will come to all who believe in him and purify their souls in the light of the Final Dawn."

traits.locale_text: 「名前すら知らぬ死からの救い…それが近づいていることに多くの者が感じている。そのうち、コロヌス・エクスパンスで生きる者達を襲うだろう。大災害が故郷を揺るがし、地球規模の虐殺が起こったとき、誰かが助けに来てくれると思うか？皇帝は助けてくれるのか? それとも{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}と呼ばれる鉄の偶像が助けてくれるか？それはない。我々は孤独に死んで見捨てられるのだ。救いを約束してくれる神はただひとり。暁の刃だ。慈悲と救いはあの方を信じる者全てに訪れて、最後の夜明けの光の中で魂を浄化するのだ」

languages.text: «La salvación de una muerte cuyo nombre aún se desconoce, pero cuya proximidad presienten muchos. Pronto se cobrará la vida de todos los habitantes de la Extensión de Koronus. ¿Crees que alguien acudirá en nuestra ayuda cuando los cataclismos sacudan nuestros hogares y se produzcan genocidios por todo el planeta? ¿El Emperador ayudará? ¿O el ídolo de hierro que llaman el {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}? No. Moriremos solos y abandonados. Solo un dios promete la salvación: el Filo del Amanecer. La misericordia y la salvación llegarán a todos los que crean en él y purifiquen sus almas a la luz del Amanecer Final».
languages.original_text: "Salvation from a death whose name is yet unknown, but whose approach is sensed by many. Soon it will claim every inhabitant of the Koronus Expanse. Do you think anyone will come to our aid when cataclysms shake our homes and planet-wide genocides are unleashed? Will the Emperor help? Or the idol of iron they call the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}? No. We will die alone and abandoned. Only one deity is promising salvation: the Edge of Daybreak. Mercy and salvation will come to all who believe in him and purify their souls in the light of the Final Dawn."

traits.locale_text: «La salvación de una muerte cuyo nombre aún se desconoce, pero cuya proximidad presienten muchos. Pronto se cobrará la vida de todos los habitantes de la Extensión de Koronus. ¿Crees que alguien acudirá en nuestra ayuda cuando los cataclismos sacudan nuestros hogares y se produzcan genocidios por todo el planeta? ¿El Emperador ayudará? ¿O el ídolo de hierro que llaman el {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}? No. Moriremos solos y abandonados. Solo un dios promete la salvación: el Filo del Amanecer. La misericordia y la salvación llegarán a todos los que crean en él y purifiquen sus almas a la luz del Amanecer Final».

languages.text: "Adı henüz kendini açık etmeyen ancak yaklaştığı pek çoklarınca hissedilen bir ölümden kurtuluş. Yakında Koronus Enginliği'nin tüm sakinlerini ele geçirecek. Söyle bana... Felaketler evlerimizi başımıza yıktığında ve gezegen çapında katliamlar kapımızı çaldığında birileri imdadımıza yetişecek mi sanıyorsun? İmparator yardım eli uzatacak mı? {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g} dedikleri demir mabut kol kanat gerecek mi? Hayır. Kaderimize terk edilip bir başımıza öleceğiz. Kurtuluş vadeden tek tanrı Tan Vakti'dir. Ona inananlar, merhametle ve kurtuluşla karşılanacak. Ruhları, Nihai Şafak'ın ışığıyla arınacak."
languages.original_text: "Salvation from a death whose name is yet unknown, but whose approach is sensed by many. Soon it will claim every inhabitant of the Koronus Expanse. Do you think anyone will come to our aid when cataclysms shake our homes and planet-wide genocides are unleashed? Will the Emperor help? Or the idol of iron they call the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}? No. We will die alone and abandoned. Only one deity is promising salvation: the Edge of Daybreak. Mercy and salvation will come to all who believe in him and purify their souls in the light of the Final Dawn."

traits.locale_text: "Adı henüz kendini açık etmeyen ancak yaklaştığı hissedilen ölümden kurtuluş. Yakında Koronus Enginliği'ndeki herkesi ele geçirecek. Söyle bana... Felaketler evlerimizi başımıza yıktığında ve gezegen çapında katliamlar kapımızı çaldığında kim yardımımıza koşacak? İmparator yardım eli uzatacak mı? Yoksa {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g} dedikleri demir mabut mu himmet edecek? Hayır. Kaderimize terk edilip bir başımıza öleceğiz. Kurtuluş vadeden tek tanrı Tan Vakti. Ona inananlar, merhametle ve kurtuluşla karşılanacak. Ruhları, Nihai Şafak'ın ışığıyla arınacak."
